name: Hexui Dark Theme (Original)
description: This is the dark version of hexui forum. Remember this is in alpha
additional_info:
0.0.1 

Released in alpha.

0.0.2

It now works for the forum.

0.0.3

Bug fixes.

0.0.4

Fixed a background issue.

0.0.5

Fixed some issues on chrome when loading the frontpage.

0.0.6

Reply now work properly.

0.0.7

PM message is visible now. The UserCP menus has also been fixed.

0.0.8

Fixed some color issues related to text on the front site.

0.0.9

Fixed the shoutbox which was effected by the 0.0.8 patch.

1.0

Now works with the new front page changes.

1.1

Changed the white borders to be tinner and darker. Mostly i have removed a lot of borders and white colors.

1.2 Last update. Will be discontinued now
